author: gstein
msg: * svn_error.h (SVN_ERR_W): new macro to bail just like SVN_ERR, but
will wrap the error with some text first.

author: cmpilato
msg: (old_backup_subdir): Delete the backup repository that's N revisions
older than this backup (64 by default).

author: cmpilato
msg: (assemble_status): Include locked directories in the list of
intesting items returned by non-verbose status requests.

author: sussman
msg: (latest_keyword_data): duh, the latest URL value isn't going to be
in the svn:entry props.  Don't look for it there.
(svn_wc_install_file): look for it here instead, by deriving it from
parent's URL.  ALSO: whoa, bugfix!  If looping over the
'regular_props' array, we should be looking at elements of *that*
array, not some other one.  No wonder translations were horked!
